items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
items.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

items.content_html: A simple yet professional task manager application built with React (Vite) and Node.js (Express) that allows users to create, view, update, and delete tasks. The backend uses SQLite with Prisma ORM, providing a lightweight and efficient database solution. Tailwind CSS is used for styling, ensuring a clean, responsive, and user-friendly interface.
items.title: NuriaAgbasi/HMTS-dts-challenge-backend: A simple yet professional task manager application built with React (Vite) and Node.js (Express) that allows users to create, view, update, and delete tasks. The backend uses SQLite with Prisma ORM, providing a lightweight and efficient database solution. Tailwind CSS is used for styling, ensuring a clean, responsive, and user-friendly interface.
